item.title: Spare a thought for innocent husbands
item.description: The dowry harassment law has been grossly misused The Centre must act to make Section 498A of the Indian Penal Code bailable writes Ritwik Bisaria
item.itunes:subtitle: The dowry harassment law has been grossly misused The Centre must act to make Section 498A of the Indian Penal Code bailable writes Ritwik Bisaria
item.itunes:summary: The dowry harassment law has been grossly misused The Centre must act to make Section 498A of the Indian Penal Code bailable writes Ritwik Bisaria

item.title: What makes UP more fragile than Bihar
item.description: Polarisation has translated into communal tensions and violence in UP while in Bihar there is greater civic engagement between communities and this has constituted a bulwark against communalism
item.itunes:subtitle: Polarisation has translated into communal tensions and violence in UP while in Bihar there is greater civic engagement between communities and this has constituted a bulwark against communalism
item.itunes:summary: Polarisation has translated into communal tensions and violence in UP while in Bihar there is greater civic engagement between communities and this has constituted a bulwark against communalism

item.title: Why Japan is wooing Prime Minister Narendra Modi
item.description: Theres no denying that Japanese PM Shinzo Abe genuinely appears to like his Indian counterpart and the feeling is visibly mutual But that can only go so far in furthering ties between two robust democracies
item.itunes:subtitle: Theres no denying that Japanese PM Shinzo Abe genuinely appears to like his Indian counterpart and the feeling is visibly mutual But that can only go so far in furthering ties between two robust democracies
item.itunes:summary: Theres no denying that Japanese PM Shinzo Abe genuinely appears to like his Indian counterpart and the feeling is visibly mutual But that can only go so far in furthering ties between two robust democracies

item.title: PM Modi is not a listener so be prepared for it
item.description: PM Narendra Modi has come to remind me of an oldfashioned headmaster He reportedly treats his ministers as schoolchildren telling them what to wear who to meet and what to say writes Mark Tully
item.itunes:subtitle: PM Narendra Modi has come to remind me of an oldfashioned headmaster He reportedly treats his ministers as schoolchildren telling them what to wear who to meet and what to say writes Mark Tully
item.itunes:summary: PM Narendra Modi has come to remind me of an oldfashioned headmaster He reportedly treats his ministers as schoolchildren telling them what to wear who to meet and what to say writes Mark Tully

item.title: Modi100 Five things to know from PM Modis big foreign policy interview
item.description: Prime Minister Narendra Modi gave his first expansive interview on foreign policy to Japanese journalists ahead of his visit to Japan on Saturday HT explains what stands out from this interesting interaction
item.itunes:subtitle: Prime Minister Narendra Modi gave his first expansive interview on foreign policy to Japanese journalists ahead of his visit to Japan on Saturday HT explains what stands out from this interesting interaction
item.itunes:summary: Prime Minister Narendra Modi gave his first expansive interview on foreign policy to Japanese journalists ahead of his visit to Japan on Saturday HT explains what stands out from this interesting interaction

item.title: Opening all the new bento boxes with Tokyo
item.description: Prime Minister Narendra Modis visit to Japan starting on Saturday is significant for a bilateral relationship that has not fulfilled its potential despite the absence of any historical or ongoing negative dimensions barring the Indian nuclear tests in 1974
item.itunes:subtitle: Prime Minister Narendra Modis visit to Japan starting on Saturday is significant for a bilateral relationship that has not fulfilled its potential despite the absence of any historical or ongoing negative dimensions barring the Indian nuclear tests in 197
item.itunes:summary: Prime Minister Narendra Modis visit to Japan starting on Saturday is significant for a bilateral relationship that has not fulfilled its potential despite the absence of any historical or ongoing negative dimensions barring the Indian nuclear tests in 1974

item.title: Befriending Japan balancing China Modis foreign policy
item.description: It appears that Modis resolve to build closer ties with Japan is to contain Chinas power Modis vision for Asia is stable power equilibrium in which India can thrive unhinderednbspwrites Brahma Chellaney
item.itunes:subtitle: It appears that Modis resolve to build closer ties with Japan is to contain Chinas power Modis vision for Asia is stable power equilibrium in which India can thrive unhinderednbspwrites Brahma Chellaney
item.itunes:summary: It appears that Modis resolve to build closer ties with Japan is to contain Chinas power Modis vision for Asia is stable power equilibrium in which India can thrive unhinderednbspwrites Brahma Chellaney

item.title: Afghanistan holds the key to regional stability
item.description: Between 1996 and 2001 Afghanistan was subjugated by Pakistan through the rule of the Taliban whereby Pakistan established a strategic backyard to counter perceived aggression from India
item.itunes:subtitle: Between 1996 and 2001 Afghanistan was subjugated by Pakistan through the rule of the Taliban whereby Pakistan established a strategic backyard to counter perceived aggression from India
item.itunes:summary: Between 1996 and 2001 Afghanistan was subjugated by Pakistan through the rule of the Taliban whereby Pakistan established a strategic backyard to counter perceived aggression from India

item.title: Licence raj has been replaced by a resource raj
item.description: Crony capitalism is a cancer that has ensured that a few get rich at the cost of the many writes Pradeep S Mehtanbsp
item.itunes:subtitle: Crony capitalism is a cancer that has ensured that a few get rich at the cost of the many writes Pradeep S Mehtanbsp
item.itunes:summary: Crony capitalism is a cancer that has ensured that a few get rich at the cost of the many writes Pradeep S Mehtanbsp

item.title: The time for repentance is past give peace a chance
item.description: Was there any patriotic fire in the cancellation of the foreign secretarylevel talks with Pakistan Ostensibly yes but intrinsically no
item.itunes:subtitle: Was there any patriotic fire in the cancellation of the foreign secretarylevel talks with Pakistan Ostensibly yes but intrinsically no
item.itunes:summary: Was there any patriotic fire in the cancellation of the foreign secretarylevel talks with Pakistan Ostensibly yes but intrinsically no

item.title: SC order weakens antidowry law hurts womens rights
item.description: The SC judgment against the mechanical arrest of those accused in dowry cases undermines womens rights writes Jayanthi Natarajan
item.itunes:subtitle: The SC judgment against the mechanical arrest of those accused in dowry cases undermines womens rights writes Jayanthi Natarajan
item.itunes:summary: The SC judgment against the mechanical arrest of those accused in dowry cases undermines womens rights writes Jayanthi Natarajan

item.title: Incredible India must move into the next orbit
item.description: The tourism sector in India is the most appropriate instrument for addressing the concerns of poverty employment and regional imbalances says Suman Billa
item.itunes:subtitle: The tourism sector in India is the most appropriate instrument for addressing the concerns of poverty employment and regional imbalances says Suman Billa
item.itunes:summary: The tourism sector in India is the most appropriate instrument for addressing the concerns of poverty employment and regional imbalances says Suman Billa

item.title: Kashmir Time for Modi to play the statesman
item.description: Narendra Modi should decide if he wants to be an ideological figure who backs the Hindutva agenda in Kashmir or be a statesman who transforms South Asia by building ties of interdependence He cannot be both writes Sushil Aaron
item.itunes:subtitle: Narendra Modi should decide if he wants to be an ideological figure who backs the Hindutva agenda in Kashmir or be a statesman who transforms South Asia by building ties of interdependence He cannot be both writes Sushil Aaron
item.itunes:summary: Narendra Modi should decide if he wants to be an ideological figure who backs the Hindutva agenda in Kashmir or be a statesman who transforms South Asia by building ties of interdependence He cannot be both writes Sushil Aaron

item.title: Attenboroughs Gandhi The movie and the idea of India
item.description: This October 2 we must organise a special screening of the movie for our lawmakers Lets see how many turn up wonders KumKum Dasgupta
item.itunes:subtitle: This October 2 we must organise a special screening of the movie for our lawmakers Lets see how many turn up wonders KumKum Dasgupta

item.title: We have to be on a constant learning curve
item.description: The government should reorient its role from education provider to that of a regulator for improving the quality of schools
item.itunes:subtitle: The government should reorient its role from education provider to that of a regulator for improving the quality of schools
item.itunes:summary: The government should reorient its role from education provider to that of a regulator for improving the quality of schools
